app: 大华-智能物联综合管理平台
seo: 大华,智能物联,信息泄露,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测大华-智能物联综合管理平台是否存在信息泄露漏洞，特别是/evo-apigw/evo-face/personInfo/page接口的敏感数据泄露问题。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Dahua Smart IoT Integrated Management Platform has information leakage vulnerabilities, especially the sensitive data leakage issue of the /evo-apigw/evo-face/personInfo/page API.
